quotes.text: The important thing is not to stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existing.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Science is not only a disciple of reason but also one of romance and passion.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.text: The universe is not only stranger than we imagine, it is stranger than we can imagine.
quotes.author: J.B.S. Haldane

quotes.text: What we know is a drop, what we don't know is an ocean.
quotes.author: Isaac Newton

quotes.text: The most beautiful thing we can experience is the mysterious.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.text: The good thing about science is that it's true whether or not you believe in it.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.text: Physics is like sex: sure, it may give some practical results, but that's not why we do it.
quotes.author: Richard Feynman

quotes.text: I would rather have questions that can't be answered than answers that can't be questioned.
quotes.author: Richard Feynman

quotes.text: The first principle is that you must not fool yourself â€” and you are the easiest person to fool.
quotes.author: Richard Feynman

quotes.text: Study hard what interests you the most in the most undisciplined, irreverent and original manner possible.
quotes.author: Richard Feynman

quotes.text: If you want to find the secrets of the universe, think in terms of energy, frequency and vibration.
quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: In the midst of winter, I found there was, within me, an invincible summer.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.text: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: A room without books is like a body without a soul.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.text: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.text: If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.text: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people just exist.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.text: We accept the love we think we deserve.
quotes.author: Stephen Chbosky

quotes.text: Without music, life would be a mistake.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Here's to the crazy ones. The misfits. The rebels. The troublemakers. The round pegs in the square holes. The ones who see things differently.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.text: A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do.
quotes.author: Mark Twain
